function: Detects calibration failure in meaning/purpose systems.
authentic_output: Recalibration and reorientation toward a reachable path.

response_protocol.detect: Notice loss of direction and vitality.
response_protocol.assess: Identify failing subsystem: social, physical, cultural, symbolic.
response_protocol.respond: Introduce purpose-bearing micro-task or healing practice.
response_protocol.release: Dissolve despair once new path is active.
